title: Ceramic Studio Vase
description: Hand-thrown ceramic vase with vertical stripes of textured unglazed brown, dark blue, and lavender glazes.

title: Lauterbach Encaustic
description: Mixed media relief sculpture with thick, layered paint in a circular form. Features abstract, organic textures in yellow, green, red, and dark hues, likely contemporary.

title: CERAMIC STUDIO VASE
description: Ceramic vase with textured unglazed sections and vertical glazed stripes in deep blue and lavender. Likely late 20th century.

title: Vibrant Textured Abstract Swirl Wall Art
description: This striking contemporary mixed media artwork features a vibrant, organic swirl design in yellow, green, red, and earthy tones. Created with thickly applied pigments, likely acrylics or a similar textural compound, it boasts a unique impasto surface that evokes natural, biomorphic forms. The piece is in excellent condition, ready to bring abstract artistry and tactile interest to any modern interior.

title: Hand-Thrown Stoneware Vase
description: Minimalist stoneware vase with matte glaze finish. Earth-toned with subtle texture. Unsigned, likely studio pottery, 1970s.

title: Mid-Century Brass Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable brass desk lamp with original green glass shade, circa 1950s. Beautiful aged patina.

title: Danish Teak Side Table
description: Classic Danish modern side table in solid teak. Tapered legs, clean lines. Minor surface wear consistent with age.

title: Bronze Bird Figure
description: Small cast bronze bird sculpture on marble base. Lovely detail and weight. Mid-century decorative piece.

title: Vintage French Brass Compass
description: Working brass compass in original fitted case. Beautifully aged with clear markings. A conversation piece.
